message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a fantastic opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $85.  Let's see if we can make a deal.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. How about $95? It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to go down to $105, but I think that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to keep negotiating, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm going to stick with my last offer of $95. I believe it's a fair price for both of us, and I hope we can finally reach an agreement.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm going to meet you at $100, but that's as low as I can go. I think this is a fair compromise, and I hope you'll see the value in this product.
